summary: Each year, DOD orders and funds maintenance work that can’t be completed by the end of the fiscal year—which it refers to as carryover. For FYs 2007-2018, the Navy, Marine Corps, and Air Force averaged less than 6 months of annual carryover; the Army averaged 10 months. DOD identified 3 different metrics it could use to calculate how much carryover it should allow. But we...
title: Depot Maintenance: DOD Should Adopt a Metric That Provides Quality Information on Funded Unfinished Work
